comment.author: 22087304@N07
comment._content: This is interesting and I'm pleased to have discovered it. The main building of the University seen here was built in stages between 1864 and 1870, I believe. You can see from later images (for example my own recent photographs) that the tower shown here was later significantly added to.

comment.author: 65393953@N03
comment._content: This photograph dates to some time between 1870, when construction was completed for the present buildings, and 1879: when Bute Hall - not here visible - was completed. I hope that's a help
